project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API. The application will display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement user input for city name
Format the output for temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Write tests for the weather fetching functionality and input handling
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure correctness
